contest-event.event-date:
April 4, 1936 D West Riding Contest (1st Section)
West Riding Contest (1st Section) 10 Test Piece Contest West Riding Contest west-riding-contest-1st-section
Faust [Berlioz, unknown arranger]
Victoria Hall, Saltaire, Shipley, Yorkshire
March contest in conjunction with section 2 - 1st Bradford City, 2nd Flockton, 3rd Canal Ironworks, 4th Clayton Subscription. 6 bands competed.
Aug. 25, 2013, 7:58 p.m. Sept. 25, 2016, 9:27 a.m.
1 Bradford City Harry Grace
2 Canal Ironworks Gershom Collison
3 Haworth Band Percy Shaw
4 Flockton United Ernest Thorpe
Unknown Result Salt's Saltaire Herbert Bowdin Hawley
Unknown Result Gawthorpe Victoria Band George Kemp
